bio:
With a Master's degree in Accountancy and Control from the University of Amsterdam, I am an experienced finance professional with international work experience in Romania, Germany and Mexico in the field of Finance & Accounting. 
I am fluent in several foreign languages such as English, German, Spanish and French, and I am an adaptable team player with a strong attention to details and with the ability to meet deadlines. 
I am committed to continuous learning and growth in a dynamic international environment.

name: Dick Jan Van Der Wolde
headline: Finance Manager / Risk manager
creator: False
bio:
Ervaren CFO in de verzekeringssector met additionele expertise in risk
management en operations. Een gedegen achtergrond in accountancy (big four).
Optimale informatievoorziening aan management in combinatie met een
kwalitatief hoogstaande externe rapportage is mijn professionele doelstelling.
Uitgangspunt is daarbij een kwalitatief goede en stabiele financiële functie om
van daaruit het management en de bedrijfsprocessen optimaal te ondersteunen
bij de ontwikkeling van groei en winstgevendheid. Gedurende 16 jaar in financieel
management in het verzekeringsbedrijf (zowel leven al schade) plus zes jaren in
de logistiek heb ik ruime ervaring opgedaan in het effectiever en efficiënter
maken van de financiële functie.
Betrokkenheid en plezier in combinatie met professionaliteit en ambitie zijn voor
mij daarbij cruciaal in een team.
Specifieke ervaringen heb ik opgedaan met het verbeteren van de
informatievoorziening, samenvoegen van afdelingen, implementeren van nieuwe
systemen, pensioenen, Solvency II, implementeren van nieuwe
verslaggevingsrichtlijnen, outsourcing, parallel hanteren van verschillende
GAAP’s, overnames, implementeren van risk management software en verbeteren
van de interne controle. De ervaringen als COO en CRO hebben mijn blik blijvend
verruimd.
Daarnaast vind ik het belangrijk om tijd te vinden voor gezin, vrienden, sport,
muziek, koken en lezen.

name: Miriam Sabien
headline: FP&A Manager | Finance Business Partner | Driving Financial Strategy & Stakeholder Impact | Retail, FMCG, Telecommunication & Fashion | CORE 5 Winner @ Crocs | Partnered with Danone, Harman, AkzoNobel
creator: False
school_1: Universiteit van Amsterdam / University of Amsterdam
bio:
Strategic and results-oriented FP&A leader with 13+ years of experience across fashion, retail, FMCG, telecom, and tech-driven industries. I bring deep expertise in financial planning, P&L ownership, and cross-functional business partnering to drive growth, profitability, and operational excellence.

Currently leading the FP&A function for EMEA and India at Crocs, where I built a high-performing team and delivered EBIT improvements by aligning financial strategy with commercial goals. I’ve held senior finance roles at Danone, AkzoNobel, Harman, and Euronext, consistently improving Free Cash Flow, streamlining forecasting, and enabling data-driven decisions.

Recognized with Crocs’ CORE 5 Award in 2023, I’m known for delivering impact, influencing stakeholders, and driving performance at scale. Passionate about simplifying complexity and enabling strategic decision-making in fast-paced environments.

name: Naomi Stacia
headline: Kitchen manager Lä Gazette Café & Boutique
creator: False
bio:
I've held various jobs driven by my diverse interests, ranging from kitchen work to assisting and menu planning for a food box company to working as a fitness coach.

In my spare time, I engage in creative activities such as baking and cooking for friends, immersing myself in writing, playing games, focusing on extensive narratives and building relationships. 

My professional experience consists of many different things, but something that ties everything together is my passion for telling stories, be it through food, film, games, sports, or the written word.

name: Coen van der Pas RA
headline: Head of Accounting & Reporting at Fourthline
creator: False
bio:
Coen joined the Deloitte Core Audit Financial Service Industry (FSI) department of Amsterdam in 2012 and reached the position of audit manager. In 2017 he became a certified public accountant. Skilled in International Financial Reporting Standards (IFRS) and the Dutch Generally Accepted Accounting Principles (Dutch GAAP).

In the course of his career he has shown personal growth both in audit technical skills and social competence. This is reflected by the ability to independently lead engagement teams and bring audits to a successful end. Furthermore, he makes an active contribution through coaching on the job, tutoring of young professionals and involvement in recruitment activities.

He has a history of working in the Fintech, Real Estate, Investment management Industry. He has developed himself into a payment industry expert, playing a central role for clients in the payment industry. In September 2020, Coen started in the position of financial controller & risk manager of Takeaway Payments.

bio:
Senior finance professional with a demonstrated history of working in the telecom, oil & gas, government and financial services industry. Business partner to board and senior management. Strong analytical skills, results driven, service and people oriented. Track record in process optimalisation and cost savings.
Business Controller | Division Controller | Program Controller | FP&A | Change Management.  

Region Randstad. Any questions, please contact me at dick.van.alphen@icloud.com or +31 6 23488715

Business Controller | Divisie Controller | Programma Controller | FP&A | Change Management.

name: Anna-Eva Winter
headline: Risicomanagement
creator: False
bio:
Ik heb uitgebreide ervaring in Riskmanagement en Audit en daarnaast ook in het doorvoeren van procesverbeteringen middels de Lean Six Sigma methodiek. 

Ik ben een geboren mediator en breng mensen van verschillende organisatieonderdelen bij elkaar voor een betere samenwerking. Als er iets onder de oppervlakte speelt, voel ik dat aan en maak ik het bespreekbaar. Mijn werk wil ik goed doen en daarom werk ik graag volgens een bepaalde methodiek, zoals Lean Six Sigma en blijf ik mijzelf ontwikkelen door training en opleiding. Verder ben ik goed ik het maken van analyses en maak ik weloverwogen keuzes.

name: Maciej Świderski ACCA
headline: Senior Lead Financial Reporting at Zalando SE
creator: False
bio:
Over 10 years of professional experience in providing assurance services to both private and listed multinational companies in diverse industry sectors, including but not limited to chemical engineering, automotive, construction, retail & consumer products, telecommunications and entertainment.

I possess extensive technical knowledge of IFRS, US GAAP and Polish GAAP.

I am a results-driven and self-motivated individual with excellent project management and communication skills. My strong analytical and conceptual thinking abilities, coupled with significant global business acumen and a dynamic solution oriented nature, ensure that my clients receive the highest standard of service.

name: Berry Ramakers
headline: Internal Audit Manager bij Vesteda
creator: False
bio:
Betrouwbare business partner met 25 jaar ervaring (uitvoerend en management) op het gebied van auditing en organisatieverbetering. Toegankelijke persoonlijkheid, die gemakkelijk communiceert op verschillende niveaus. Verbinding maken met mensen en nieuwsgierigheid zijn belangrijke drives. 
In staat om in korte tijd nieuwe kennis te verwerven en zaken te doorgronden. 
Een groot verantwoordelijkheidsgevoel en sterke organisatie, planning en control. 
Trots als zaken, samen met een team, tot stand zijn gebracht c.q. vooruitgang is geboekt.
Een brede belangstelling voor processen, ingevoerd in verzekeringen en vastgoed, maar enthousiasme om nieuwe organisaties te leren kennen.

Internal audit: Operational audits, compliance audits, project audits, Management van internal audit afdeling
Procesmanagement: processen beschreven en optimaliseren,  projectmanagement op dat gebied of bedrijfsvoering.

name: Christel de Jong
headline: Eigenaar SET | Coach | PE Specialist | Workshop Leader | Trainer in CLIL & Health Education | Building stronger minds & bodies – ready for Spain 2025
creator: True
bio:
🌍 Founder | Coach | Trainer | Educator | Inspirator | Triathlete

💡 “The most beautiful life is not the one you plan — it’s the one that unfolds when you follow your heart.”

🎯 Looking for new professional opportunities in Spain (hybrid or on-site) from autumn 2025 / early 2026. Open to schools, sports organisations, training camps, personal coaching, and more.

🇬🇧 About me
I’m Christel de Jong – a passionate and versatile coach, educator, and sports professional with over 22 years of experience in physical education, youth coaching, community building and endurance sports. In 2023, I founded SET – Sports Education Transformation to inspire people through movement, education and mindset.

Through my work, I support and challenge people – young and old – to become stronger, both mentally and physically. Whether it’s in the classroom, on the track, in the water or in a workshop setting.

🔹 I create and deliver interactive training sessions, both nationally and internationally (Spain, Curaçao).
🔹 I coach athletes (triathlon, marathon, trail) and design personal training plans.
🔹 I organise and guide physical & mental challenges (like the Mind & Muscle Challenge) for large online communities.
🔹 I give swim training, bootcamp sessions and clinics.
🔹 I founded www.amazingpelessons.com – a free global platform for bilingual PE.
🔹 I speak and lead workshops on CLIL, motivation, health and didactics.
🔹 I was head coach at a youth football academy, and still love working with teams.
🔹 I organise events, sports days, clinics and even entire training camps.

🏊‍♀️🏃‍♀️🚴 As an endurance athlete (4x Ironman 70.3, multiple marathons, trail runs, SwimRuns, Alpe d’HuZes), I know what it means to train with focus, balance and heart. That mindset flows into everything I do.

From autumn/winter 2025, I’ll be moving to Spain – and I’m looking to collaborate with international schools, sports centres, swimming schools, gyms, or training camp organisations.
I’m also open to freelance work, guest coaching, or starting something new together.

📩 Let’s connect if you’re looking for someone with:
✔️ Energy and initiative
✔️ Real experience
✔️ A big heart for people, health and performance

✉️ Mail: sportseducationtransformation@gmail.com
🌐 Website: www.sportseducationtransformation.com

💬 “Whatever you do – do it with purpose, with people, and with joy.”

name: Refi Ihsan Berent
headline: Partner & Strategy Director at POLMAK GROUP
creator: False
bio:
As an executive director at a mid-size family office, with an international background in finance and social studies, I would be glad to hear from you on the following:
* Ethical Investment Opportunities
* Healthy Food Production; especially Nuts and Vegetables
* Sustainable Industry for the Mining and Drilling Industries

Otherwise, if your vision is environmentally conscious, lets also talk. I will gladly consider offering my financial and strategic experience pro bono for your cause.

Thanks for the visit

name: Tomas Bogaerts
headline: Owner Solidum Financial Advisory
creator: False
bio:
Met Solidum Financial Advisory richt ik me op financiële en strategische dienstverlening aan bedrijven in beweging. Dit met als doel om tot efficiëntere en effectievere besluitvorming te komen en de financiële functie te verbeteren.
Mijn dienstverlening bestaat onder andere uit verslaggevingsvraagstukken, ondersteuning bij complexe jaarrekeningtrajecten maar ook verbetering van stuurinformatie en de inrichting van de (financiële) organisatie.

name: Casper Fransz
headline: Chief Strategy Officer at Infinitas Learning
creator: False
current_position: Chief Strategy Officer, Member of the Executive Team
bio:
Excited to make a positive difference to education in Europe as Chief Strategy Officer at Infinitas Learning, a leading provider of educational solutions on a mission to support all teachers and learners to reach their potential and improve their learning outcomes.

For 15 years I have been an executive and advisor to companies that create value by serving customers better, faster, and cheaper through leverage of digital, data & AI. Although I have worked in many different industries, my track record is especially built across consumer multinationals, education, and private equity. 

At Infinitas Learning my responsibilities cover business strategy, strategic planning, m&a, data & analytics. I am also involved in several key innovation and transformation programs that are critical to the company long term success.

name: Sander Oleana
headline: Strategic Partnerships @ Uber | Delivery & Demand | Driving Growth through High-Impact Collaborations
creator: False
current_position: Business Development, EMEA - Delivery and Demand Growth
school_1: University of Amsterdam - Amsterdam Business School
school_2: Maastricht University School of Business and Economics
bio:
As a creative and agile individual with handful of experience in strategy development, operations administration, sustainable development and agile portfolio management. I have been at the frontline of business working both in-house and as a consultant to turn huge ideas into creative, practical, and implementable solutions.

Forming a sustainable vision, identifying risks and opportunities, designing market-driven strategies, generating buy-in, laying out practical roadmaps, motivating teams, stimulating cross-pollination, monitoring progress, and identifying improvements are just a few skills I possess.

I am dedicated to assisting and collaborating with individuals and groups as they create and grow their impactful businesses. My objective is to significantly contribute to organization success stories by establishing, growing, and scaling their operations in order to achieve (even) greater impact.

Just a handful of my key professional achievements include;
• Located business opportunities, gathered consumer insights, and implemented cutting-edge strategies to facilitate organizations in achieving scalable growth.
• Executed need-based interventions, related to events, information exchange, and lobbying, to ensure SMEs in Amsterdam and expand sustainably.
• Implemented two strategic initiatives to improve performance by establishing formal Young Deloitte Board at Deloitte NL.

I have spoken and written on various topics of sustainable strategy and the SDGs. I've lived and worked in the following countries, including The Netherlands, Curacao and South Africa.

Core Competencies: Business Sustainability | Cultural Transformation | Strategic Planning & Analysis | Risk Mitigation | Stakeholder Engagement | Client Service Excellence | Team Building & Leadership | Process Integration | Technology Integration | SAFe and Benefits Management | Product Roadmaps | Market Assessment | Training & Development | Budgeting & Forecasting

name: Dana Cotorobai
headline: Strategic Sustainability Leader | ESG & CSRD Expert |                                                                              Driving Business Impact through Purpose
creator: False
bio: I’m a Sustainability Leader with 10+ years of experience across energy, real estate, consultancy, and product-based industries. I specialize in CSRD, ESRS, and GRI-aligned strategies, ESG reporting, and stakeholder engagement. My work has delivered measurable improvements in ESG performance and compliance. I lead global teams and embed sustainability into business operations. With a balance of analytical rigor and hands-on execution, I drive real-world impact.

name: Eric de Gans
headline: Klantbeheerder | Accountant | kennisgroep zorg | aaff
creator: False
bio: Ik ben een ervaren accountant/adviseur met de focus op (kleinere) zorg ondernemingen en MKB. Door mijn pro-actieve houding en kennis van de regelgeving ben ik een uitstekende sparringpartner voor ondernemers. Samen met specialisten binnen Alfa en andere professionals binnen mijn netwerk kan ik de ondernemer en zijn of haar onderneming altijd voorzien van antwoord. Daarnaast stuur ik het team van klantbeheerders en assistent accountants aan op de vestiging Heerhugowaard.

bio: Senior financial professional with extensive experience as an audit partner, specializing in supporting businesses at various stages of growth. With two decades of experience delivering audit and assurance services to a diverse range of clients, including start-ups, scale-ups, privately owned towards (inter)national and publicly listed entities, I bring a unique combination of strategic insight, technical expertise, and leadership. name: Ton-Tijn Hulleman
headline: CFO/COO
creator: False
bio:
My Masters’ in Health Science, Controlling and Valuation and M&A combined with a profound interest in the human body and medical technology have allowed for a career involved in almost every aspect of fast growing medtech companies, creating a broad understanding of what it takes to make a medtech company successful.  This regulated industry requires integral thinking and solid planning and that is what makes me very excited to combine all my experience and knowledge into leading Aetherus on its mission to improve COPD-patients’ lives of today and tomorrow. Should you be interested in an early stage healthtech investment opportunity please contact me at t.hulleman@aetherus.health

I bore responsibilities for Finance (corporate finance, controlling, accounting), Legal, IT, HR, Sales, Marketing, Customer Service, Logistics and Supply Chain. I am pragmatic, resourceful and enjoy challenges. I am an analytic and hands-on person turning ideas into value.
 
Specialties: General Management, Corporate Finance, Strategy, M&A, Valuation, Stakeholder Management, Private Equity, Listed Companies, Operational Management, Purchasing, warehousing and logistics, customer service, Business Modelling, Decision Support, Negotiations, Commercial Contract Management, labor law, Incentive Plans, Pricing, Human Resource Management, FP&A, Compliance, ERP, Finance software, QMS.

Industries: Medical Devices, Oncology, Vascular Access, Varicose Veins, Cardiac Rhythm, Atrial fibrillation, Ophthalmology, Pulmonology, Respiratory failure, Dyspnea

Geographical Orientation: Europe, EMEA, USA, APAC

name: Manon Leeflang-Pusters
headline: Specialist Arbeidsmobiliteit | Loopbaanadvies | Outplacement | Re-integratie | Systeem Therapeutisch Werker | ICR.B/C® erkend
creator: False
current_position: Loopbaancoach | Outplacement | Re-integratie adviseur | Zelfstandig Coordinator Mobiliteit a.i.
bio:
---------- Bureau Leeflang ---------- 
info@bureauleeflang.nl - www.bureauleeflang.nl - 06-38546193

Wie zijn we?

Bureau Leeflang is gespecialiseerd in arbeidsmobiliteit in de breedste zin van het woord.

We begeleiden mensen in een loopbaan-, outplacement- of re-integratietraject. Ons doel is het vergroten van de zelfredzaamheid en draagkracht van jou als medewerker of werkzoekende. Je krijgt inzicht in wat je drijft, je onderzoekt mogelijkheden en je vindt oplossingen. We richten samen de blik op een volgende stap in je carrière.  


Wat kenmerkt onze werkwijze?​

We staan voor energie, durf en beweging.
Oprechte passie voor de medemens en ons vakgebied.
Persoonlijke aandacht is de basis: luisteren, ventileren, sparren en overleggen.
Werken met een duidelijk stappenplan om het beste en vooraf afgesproken resultaat te halen.
Kennis van relevante wet- en regelgeving, correcte dossieropbouw.
Een snelle reactietijd binnen 24 uur en open en transparante communicatie.
Een actief netwerk aan werkgevers en professionals.​

Hoe gaan we met elkaar om?

Als we je begeleiden doen we dat vanuit drie kernwaarden: we doen het samen, we houden het puur en we blijven positief.

Behoefte aan een goed gesprek?

Maak vrijblijvend een afspraak voor een kennismaking via onze website. De praktijk is open voor iedereen die zijn of haar mogelijkheden wil verkennen. Persoonlijk contact zegt zoveel meer dan alleen het geschreven woord. Als je elkaar ontmoet weet je of de klik er is.

De 'koffie' staat klaar....

bio:
Dynamic and results-driven finance professional with extensive experience in the Environmental Commodity Trading, Financial Services and Accounting & Auditing industry. I am a certified Chartered Accountant and CFP® Professional with a Master of Business Administration.

My professional core competencies include Financial Accounting,  Finance, Tax,  Auditing & Assurance and Financial Management. I am a fast-learner, highly analytical, a keen problem solver and able to handle complex assignments effectively. 

I am an ambitious person with a positive attitude towards my work. From team leader to team player, I use my organizational and leadership skills to ensure the common goal is obtained.

name: Kurt Wu

bio: I have more than ten years of experience in the M.I.C.E. industry, with a focus on international trade, market research, branding, and sales. I am the Chairman of ECMN, an association that connects and promotes European and Chinese events and meeting labels through podcast and video content. I have a strong network of contacts and partners in both regions, and I have organized and facilitated several hybrid events, such as the China-Netherlands Economic Cooperation Forum, China International Import Exposition, and Canton Fair. I am passionate about creating meaningful and impactful experiences for businesses and audiences, and I am always looking for new opportunities and challenges.

name: Manon Douwes
headline: 🟢 Expert in het organiseren van succesvolle zakelijke evenementen voor Corporates en MKB. Ik help bedrijven bij het ontwerpen en produceren van hun event. Van advies tot volledige ontzorging. Freelance en interim.
creator: False
bio:
Hi, mijn naam is Manon Douwes, (interim) eventmanager/ eventproducer.

Ik heb jarenlang evenementen georganiseerd aan zowel bureau als klantzijde. Sinds 2019 werk ik freelance en help ik middelgrote en grote bedrijven bij de organisatie van hun evenementen.  

Soms betekent dit dat ik de volledige productie van een evenement, op projectbasis, uit handen neem. Andere keren werk ik als interim eventmanager en pak ik alle lopende events op, adviseer ik over strategie of is er binnen het team behoefte aan eventprofessionalisering. 

Afgelopen jaren werkte ik als (interim) eventmanager o.a. voor Aegon, Loyens & Loeff, ING,  Allen & Overy, Obsession, Credit Europe Bank, The Oval Office, Kia, Nissan, Clifford Chance, Leaseplan, T-Mobile, Alliance Automotive Group Benelux, Salonized, Xsaga, Schiphol Real Estate en T-Mobile.

Meer weten? Stuur gerust een mail naar manon@outofoffice-events of bel+31 (0)651 92 48 48.

name: Edson Tromp
headline: Building Moments That Last | Events • Artists • Production
creator: False
bio:
Hi, I’m Edson, an event professional dedicated to creating unforgettable experiences with hands on experience organizing club nights, managing stages at major festivals, and coordinating events. I work closely with international artists as an artist handler and stage manager to ensure smooth operations and a welcoming atmosphere.

With a sharp eye for detail, strong teamwork, and a proactive approach, I thrive at bringing ideas to life from initial concept through flawless execution. I’m skilled in logistics, team leadership, and stakeholder coordination to make every event a success.

I’m always open to new challenges and collaborations. Let’s connect to create impactful and memorable experiences together.

name: Hendrik Simons
headline: Senior Cultuurcoach - Cultuurmakers Maastricht
creator: False
bio:
Hendrik Simons is a multidisciplinary artist, designer and thinker exploring the intersection of digital and physical media and experiences. He navigates the tension between structured design and raw experimentation, constantly shifting between the digital and analog worlds. His work spans album covers, political campaigns, clothing, websites, fine-art prints, raves, exhibitions, visual identities, compositions, sculptures, and more. 

In his studio, he experiments with different materials and techniques, embracing a hands-on approach that challenges the separation between digital precision and physical imperfection. By merging experimental craftsmanship with algorithmic aesthetics, he seeks new ways to construct and perceive form.
